dataCustodian.title: Data Custodian
dataCustodian.description: An HTML description of the custodian of the data sources in this group.

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: A set of properties of MapServer items that should not be loaded.

itemProperties.title: Item properties
itemProperties.description: A list of properties that will be set on each child item. For example, { 'treat404AsError': false }
